sentences.sContent: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.sCn: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

sentences.sContent: Roy scored a classic goal in the 90th minute.
sentences.sCn: 罗伊在第90分钟时踢进了漂亮的一球。

sentences.sContent: ‘La Grande Illusion’ is one of the classics of French cinema.
sentences.sCn: 《大幻影》是法国电影中的经典作品之一。

synos.tran: 经典的；古典的，传统的；最优秀的
名著；经典著作；大艺术家

words.tran: 古典的；经典的；传统的；第一流的
仿古典风格；崇尚古典风格

trans.tranOther: admired by many people, and having a value that has continued for a long time
a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time
